message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I could come down to $180, but I can't go any lower than that. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's quality.
Alice, $180 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $150.  If you can't meet me there, I'll have to go with John's offer.
